short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the Robux Amount your account if needed for privacy reasons

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RoHide allows users to eliminate their Robux Amount from their account if they may need it for privacy concerns. You are still able to view your Robux by looking inside your "My Transactions" Tab.
